TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit ObfuscationAttribute extends System.Attribute
Public NotInheritable Class ObfuscationAttribute Inherits Attribute
public ref class ObfuscationAttribute sealed : Attribute

Attribute.AttributeName: System.AttributeUsage(System.AttributeTargets.Assembly | System.AttributeTargets.Class | System.AttributeTargets.Struct | System.AttributeTargets.Enum | System.AttributeTargets.Method | System.AttributeTargets.Property | System.AttributeTargets.Field | System.AttributeTargets.Event | System.AttributeTargets.Interface | System.AttributeTargets.Parameter | System.AttributeTargets.Delegate, AllowMultiple=true, Inherited=false)

summary.span: 指示模糊化工具針對組件 (Assembly)、型別或成員，採取指定的動作。

span.span: Instructs obfuscation tools to take the specified actions for an assembly, type, or member.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 和屬性可讓組件作者可以加上註解的二進位檔，以便模糊化工具可以正確地處理這些最少的外部組態。The and attributes allow assembly authors to annotate their binaries so that obfuscation tools can process them correctly with minimal external configuration. > [!IMPORTANT] > 套用這個屬性並不會自動模糊化您套用它的程式碼實體。Applying this attribute does not automatically obfuscate the code entity to which you apply it. 套用此屬性是建立模糊化工具的組態檔的替代方案。Applying the attribute is an alternative to creating a configuration file for the obfuscation tool. 也就是說，它只提供模糊化工具的指示。That is, it merely provides instructions for an obfuscation tool. Microsoft 建議的模糊化工具廠商依照此處所述的語意。Microsoft recommends that vendors of obfuscation tools follow the semantics described here. 不過，沒有特定的工具會遵循 Microsoft 建議保證。However, there is no guarantee that a particular tool follows Microsoft recommendations. 屬性包含字串屬性。The attribute has a string property. 模糊化工具可以對應至功能，這些物件實作，最好是使用 XML 組態檔的使用者可存取的字串值，這個屬性。Obfuscation tools can map the string values of this property to features they implement, preferably by using an XML configuration file that users can access. 定義兩個功能的字串、"default"和"all"。The defines two feature strings, "default" and "all". 「 預設 」 的字串應對應至預設模糊化工具的功能，而"all"應該對應至一組完整的工具支援模糊化功能。The string "default" should map to the default obfuscation features of a tool, and "all" should map to the complete set of obfuscation features supported by a tool. 預設值屬性是 [全部]，啟用一組完整的模糊化功能。The default value of the property is "all", enabling the complete set of obfuscation features. 當套用至組件，也適用於所有類型的組件中。When applied to an assembly, also applies to all types within the assembly. 如果屬性未指定，或設為`true`，屬性會套用至所有的成員。If the property is not specified, or is set to `true`, the attribute applies to all members as well. 未指定組件是公用或私用。 does not specify whether an assembly is public or private. 若要指定組件是公用或私用，請使用屬性。To specify whether an assembly is public or private, use the attribute. 當套用至類別和結構，也適用於所有成員的類型如果屬性未指定，或設為`true`。When applied to classes and structures, also applies to all members of the type if the property is not specified, or is set to `true`. 當套用至方法、 參數、 欄位和屬性，這個屬性會影響只有要套用的實體。When applied to methods, parameters, fields, and properties, the attribute affects only the entity to which it is applied. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例顯示使用兩種類型的公用組件：`Type1`和`Type2`。The following code example shows a public assembly with two types: `Type1` and `Type2`. 組件標示為與模糊化，將標示要被視為公用的組件 (也就是屬性是`false`)。The assembly is marked for obfuscation with the , which marks the assembly to be treated as public (that is, the property is `false`). `Type1` 已標示為混淆，因為組件標示為進行模糊化。`Type1` is marked for obfuscation because the assembly is marked for obfuscation. 其中一個成員`Type1`排除模糊化，從使用屬性。One member of `Type1` is excluded from obfuscation, using the property. `Type2` 排除從模糊化，但因為其成員標示為模糊化屬性是`false`。`Type2` is excluded from obfuscation, but its members are marked for obfuscation because the property is `false`. `MethodA`方法`Type2`標示值`"default"`如屬性。The `MethodA` method of `Type2` is marked with the value `"default"` for the property. 它就必須指定`false`的屬性，以避免排除`MethodA`從混淆，因為的預設值屬性是`true`。It is necessary to specify `false` for the property to avoid excluding `MethodA` from obfuscation, because the default for the property is `true`. 模糊化工具應該不去除屬性模糊化之後因為屬性是`false`。The obfuscation tool should not strip the attribute after obfuscation because the property is `false`. 模糊化之後, 會移除此程式碼範例中的所有其他屬性，因為屬性未指定，且因此預設值為`true`。All the other attributes in this code example are stripped after obfuscation, because the property is not specified, and therefore defaults to `true`. 程式碼範例包含程式碼，以顯示屬性和其屬性。The code example includes code to display the attributes and their properties. 您也可以藉由開啟 DLL 來檢查屬性[Ildasm.exe （IL 解譯器）](~/docs/framework/tools/ildasm-exe-il-disassembler.md)。You can also examine the attributes by opening the DLL with the [Ildasm.exe (IL Disassembler)](~/docs/framework/tools/ildasm-exe-il-disassembler.md). remarks.format: ## Remarks 未指定組件是公用或私用。 does not specify whether an assembly is public or private. 若要指定組件是公用或私用，請使用。To specify whether an assembly is public or private, use .

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool ApplyToMembers { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定 值，指出某個型別的屬性是否要用至該型別的成員。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the attribute of a type is to apply to the members of the type.

value.span: 如果屬性要用至該型別的成員，則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if the attribute is to apply to the members of the type; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性會套用至成員時，會忽略這個屬性的值。The value of this property is ignored when the attribute is applied to a member. > [!IMPORTANT] > 套用這個屬性並不會自動模糊化您套用它的程式碼實體。Applying this attribute does not automatically obfuscate the code entity to which you apply it. 套用此屬性是建立模糊化工具的組態檔的替代方案。Applying the attribute is an alternative to creating a configuration file for the obfuscation tool. 也就是說，它只提供模糊化工具的指示。That is, it merely provides instructions for an obfuscation tool. Microsoft 建議的模糊化工具廠商依照此處所述的語意。Microsoft recommends that vendors of obfuscation tools follow the semantics described here. 不過，沒有特定的工具會遵循 Microsoft 建議保證。However, there is no guarantee that a particular tool follows Microsoft recommendations. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例顯示從模糊化，排除的型別，但排除不適用於其成員因為屬性是`false`。The following code example shows a type that is excluded from obfuscation, but the exclusion does not apply to its members because the property is `false`. 此程式碼是可編譯及執行之較大範例的一部分。This code is part of a larger example that can be compiled and executed. 請參閱 類別。See the class. [!code-csharp[ObfuscationAttribute#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/ObfuscationAttribute/cs/source.cs#2)] [!code-vb[ObfuscationAttribute#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/ObfuscationAttribute/vb/source.vb#2)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool Exclude { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定 值，指出模糊化工具是否應該將型別或成員排除模糊化。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the obfuscation tool should exclude the type or member from obfuscation.

value.span: 如果套用這項屬性的型別或成員應該排除模糊化，則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if the type or member to which this attribute is applied should be excluded from obfuscation; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!IMPORTANT] > 套用這個屬性並不會自動模糊化您套用它的程式碼實體。Applying this attribute does not automatically obfuscate the code entity to which you apply it. 套用此屬性是建立模糊化工具的組態檔的替代方案。Applying the attribute is an alternative to creating a configuration file for the obfuscation tool. 也就是說，它只提供模糊化工具的指示。That is, it merely provides instructions for an obfuscation tool. Microsoft 建議的模糊化工具廠商依照此處所述的語意。Microsoft recommends that vendors of obfuscation tools follow the semantics described here. 不過，沒有特定的工具會遵循 Microsoft 建議保證。However, there is no guarantee that a particular tool follows Microsoft recommendations. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會顯示標記為排除模糊化的型別。The following code example shows a type that is marked to be excluded from obfuscation. 不需要指定屬性，因為它會預設為`true`，但是明確指定它可以讓您的意圖清除。It is not necessary to specify the property, because it defaults to `true`, but specifying it explicitly makes your intent clear. 設`false`，以便從模糊化排除可能不適用於類別的成員。The is set to `false`, so that the exclusion from obfuscation does not apply to the members of the class. 也就是類別名稱是可見的但是經過混淆的成員。That is, the class name is visible but the members are obfuscated. `MethodA`方法已標記為具有值`"default"`如屬性。The `MethodA` method is marked with the value `"default"` for the property. 它就必須指定`false`的屬性，就可以避免排除`MethodA`從混淆，因為的預設值屬性是`true`。It is necessary to specify `false` for the property in order to avoid excluding `MethodA` from obfuscation, because the default for the property is `true`. 屬性是`false`以便模糊化工具不會混淆之後刪除屬性。The property is `false` so that the obfuscation tool will not strip the attribute after obfuscation. 此程式碼是可編譯及執行之較大範例的一部分。This code is part of a larger example that can be compiled and executed. 請參閱 類別。See the class. [!code-csharp[ObfuscationAttribute#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/ObfuscationAttribute/cs/source.cs#4)] [!code-vb[ObfuscationAttribute#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/ObfuscationAttribute/vb/source.vb#4)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ Feature { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定字串值，這個字串值是由模糊化工具所辨認，而且會指定處理選項。

span.span: Gets or sets a string value that is recognized by the obfuscation tool, and which specifies processing options.

value.span: 字串值，這個字串值是由模糊化工具所辨認，而且會指定處理選項。

span.span: A string value that is recognized by the obfuscation tool, and which specifies processing options.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 傳遞給這個屬性的值取決於使用模糊化工具。The value passed to this property depends on the obfuscation tool used. 建議該廠商的工具支援至少模糊化"default"和"all"。It is recommended that vendors of obfuscation tools support at least "default" and "all". 供應商可以使用這些設定一起使用的 XML 組態檔。Vendors can use these settings in conjunction with the XML configuration file. > [!IMPORTANT] > 套用這個屬性並不會自動模糊化您套用它的程式碼實體。Applying this attribute does not automatically obfuscate the code entity to which you apply it. 套用此屬性是建立模糊化工具的組態檔的替代方案。Applying the attribute is an alternative to creating a configuration file for the obfuscation tool. 也就是說，它只提供模糊化工具的指示。That is, it merely provides instructions for an obfuscation tool. Microsoft 建議的模糊化工具廠商依照此處所述的語意。Microsoft recommends that vendors of obfuscation tools follow the semantics described here. 不過，沒有特定的工具會遵循 Microsoft 建議保證。However, there is no guarantee that a particular tool follows Microsoft recommendations. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會顯示標記值的方法`"default"`如屬性。The following code example shows a method that is marked with the value `"default"` for the property. 它就必須指定`false`的屬性，以避免排除`MethodA`從混淆，因為的預設值屬性是`true`。It is necessary to specify `false` for the property to avoid excluding `MethodA` from obfuscation, because the default for the property is `true`. 屬性是`false`以便模糊化工具不會混淆之後刪除屬性。The property is `false` so that the obfuscation tool will not strip the attribute after obfuscation. 此程式碼是可編譯及執行之較大範例的一部分。This code is part of a larger example that can be compiled and executed. 請參閱 類別。See the class. [!code-csharp[ObfuscationAttribute#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/ObfuscationAttribute/cs/source.cs#3)] [!code-vb[ObfuscationAttribute#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/ObfuscationAttribute/vb/source.vb#3)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool StripAfterObfuscation { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定 值，指出模糊化工具是否應該在進行處理後移除這項屬性。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the obfuscation tool should remove this attribute after processing.

value.span: 如果模糊化工具應該在進行處理後移除屬性，則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if an obfuscation tool should remove the attribute after processing; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果您的程式庫會納入其他應用程式的一部分，而且混淆做為該應用程式的一部分，就應該刪除屬性。Attributes should not be stripped if your library will be included as part of another application, and obfuscated as part of that application. > [!IMPORTANT] > 套用這個屬性並不會自動模糊化您套用它的程式碼實體。Applying this attribute does not automatically obfuscate the code entity to which you apply it. 套用此屬性是建立模糊化工具的組態檔的替代方案。Applying the attribute is an alternative to creating a configuration file for the obfuscation tool. 也就是說，它只提供模糊化工具的指示。That is, it merely provides instructions for an obfuscation tool. Microsoft 建議的模糊化工具廠商依照此處所述的語意。Microsoft recommends that vendors of obfuscation tools follow the semantics described here. 不過，沒有特定的工具會遵循 Microsoft 建議保證。However, there is no guarantee that a particular tool follows Microsoft recommendations. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範其屬性是`false`以便模糊化工具不會混淆之後刪除屬性。The following code example shows an whose property is `false` so that the obfuscation tool will not strip the attribute after obfuscation. 它就必須指定`false`的屬性，以避免排除`MethodA`從混淆，因為的預設值屬性是`true`。It is necessary to specify `false` for the property to avoid excluding `MethodA` from obfuscation, because the default for the property is `true`. 此程式碼是可編譯及執行之較大範例的一部分。This code is part of a larger example that can be compiled and executed. 請參閱 類別。See the class. [!code-csharp[ObfuscationAttribute#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/ObfuscationAttribute/cs/source.cs#4)] [!code-vb[ObfuscationAttribute#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/ObfuscationAttribute/vb/source.vb#4)]
